title: Ticket #3875: Remove condor_init and options that only it uses
description: The script condor_init has had no functional changes since 1998 and isn't used or referenced anywhere in our codebase or documentation. We should remove it. We should also remove the -owner and -host options to condor_config_val, which only exist to support condor_init, according to comments in the code.
remarks:
2018-Oct-22 15:20:09 by jfrey:
This change doesn't merit a version history mention.
